titleStmt.title: A defence of the Thirty nine articles of the Church of England written in Latin by J. Ellis ... now done into English ; to which are added the Lambeth Articles ; together with the judgment of Bishop Andrews, Dr. Overall, and other eminent and learned men upon them.
Articulorum XXXIX Ecclesiae Anglicanae defensio. English
titleStmt.author: Ellis, John, 1599?-1665.
Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
Overall, John, 1560-1619.
Church of England. Thirty-nine Articles.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Bonwicke, T. Goodwin, M. Wooten, S. Manship, and B. Tooke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Advertisement: p. [3-4] at front and p. [1] at end.
